channel.title: Error (Friend)
channel.description:
I am posting this for my friend. I try logging in well it's my server also and it says "No response from server, try a different world"
Then he looks on his runserver I think and he got this error...
[code]Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:5555 ClientHandler: Accepted from 5.150.158.174:3456 Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 800 at Player.<init>(Player.java:47) at client.<init>(client.java:7669) at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:44) at server.run(server.java:150) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]

item.title: Error (Friend)
item.dc:creator: @MoparRocksScape MoparRocksScape
item.description:
@MoparRocksScape wrote:

Must be an error with PlayerHandler.java

~Mike

Read full topic
